ValidationRule.description: GTMS-26117: Created as part of Partners H1 project to throw error if Influenced Payout % field is empty when Influenced Payout Model is selected as Percentage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Influence_Payout_Model__c ,'Percentage'), OR( Influence_Payout_Percentage__c < 0, Influence_Payout_Percentage__c > 1, ISNULL(Influence_Payout_Percentage__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You’ve selected ‘Percentage’ for the Influenced Payout Model, but have not included the desired percentage amount. Please update the 'Influence Payout Percentage” to a number greater than 0 and lower than 100 to save this program.
